title: PetFriends
description: A unique website to find the pet of your dreams!

title: SQL Employee Tracker
description: Back-end project that uses content management systems to allow non-developers to easily access and view information about employees stored in an SQL database

title: Takiwatanga
description: Social networking app designed for people who know someone with special needs, or for people who have special needs, to safely communicate and share experiences with one another

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather dashboard that uses an API to give the weather for any location, 5 days in advance

title: Team Generator
description: Front-end Team Generator application that creates team members based on CLI prompts, and uses JEST to test components.
technologies: JavaScript, Jest, HTML, CSS, Node, Express

title: Just Another Text Editor
description: Just Another Text Editor is a Progressive Web Application that can be used on your browser or installed and used locally
